title: How to Change a Path Full of Thorns into One Full of Happiness - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Charismatic Protagonist   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Nobles   Revenge
author: Chae Habin   채하빈
description:
I am Karne Pivoine Feian, a poor and pitiful princess in hiding. Due to some unfortunate circumstances, I’m currently residing in the house of a Baroness under a hidden identity. I promised I’d do anything they asked me. But I didn’t think I’d be asked to do things that would put my life in danger! As expected, freeloading in someone else's house is no easy feat. I've got no choice. I have to find a way to reclaim my identity!

One day, a handsome man approached me to offer a deal.
'I’ll give you an unimaginably great reward if you bring me what I ask of you.'

I think I've already found my reward, though! I've not only gained money, but an absolute hottie as well. Will I finally be able to walk down a path of happiness?>
